name: Free Bulk Price Update for Woocommerce
author: Kunal Verma

sections.description:
Free Bulk Price Update for Woocommerce is a free plugin designed to help you easily update product prices for both variable and simple products in your WooCommerce store. This plugin provides different formulas to increment, decrement, multiply, or divide product prices in bulk.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. For more information, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html.
sections.faq:
How do I use the plugin?

After activating the plugin, navigate to the “Bulk Price Editor”. Select the field according to your requirement.

What formulas are available?

  • Increment: Increase the product price by a fixed amount or percentage.
  • Decrement: Decrease the product price by a fixed amount or percentage.
  • Multiply: Multiply the product price by a specific factor.
  • Divide: Divide the product price by a specific factor.

Can I update prices for both variable and simple products?

Yes, this plugin allows you to update prices for both variable and simple products in your WooCommerce store.

Is this plugin free?

Yes, Free Bulk Price Update for Woocommerce is completely free to use.

short_description: Short Description: Update WooCommerce product prices in bulk using increment, decrement, multiply, or divide formulas for variable and simple products …
